t: Amazon.com: Driftsun Voyager Inflatable Kayak 2 Person Tandem, Foldable Kayaks for Adults Includes 2 Aluminum Paddles, 2 Padded Seats, Double Action Pump and Travel Backpack : Sports & Outdoors
s: Amazon said to contact manufacturer so I did that next. After weeks of back and forth emails including photos they said there is nothing they will do, that it is Amazon who is liable. So I am out several hundreds $$$ and had to purchase another kayak. I did not repurchase this brand!
